name: Part Of The Pack
description:
In this local co-op party game, you must blend into the crowd to avoid detection from other players while attempting to eliminate the other players without being found.

How To Play:

1) Find yourself amidst the crowd

2) Find and kill all other enemy players OR touch all 5 statues to win

Supports up to 4 players. 2 of the 4 can be on keyboard. Controls shown in how-to-play game screen.

Built with OpenGL. Currently Windows is the only supported platform.

Source code: https://github.com/FaultyPine/tiny_engine
